recipes.label: New Disruptor!
recipes.startdescription: A falling star tears the sky asunder, trailing a blazing ribbon of light down to earth. Its searing path draws the Black Eagle's attention. Now, the Eagle's talons swarm forth, eager and hungry, pouring into this fated battlefield.

recipes.label: New Disruptor!
recipes.startdescription: A falling star tears the sky asunder, trailing a blazing ribbon of light down to earth. Its searing path draws the Black Eagle's attention. Now, the Eagle's talons swarm forth, eager and hungry, pouring into this fated battlefield.

recipes.label: Index-Arcana Awaits Action
recipes.startdescription: The forces of the Index-Arcana are calibrating their devices. They await an order, a signal, an opportunity that will bring them victory.

recipes.label: Index-Arcana Awaits Action
recipes.startdescription: The forces of the Index-Arcana are calibrating their devices. They await an order, a signal, an opportunity that will bring them victory.

recipes.label: Wings of the Black Eagle
recipes.startdescription: As night falls, we find more of the Black Eagle's talons have been dispatched here. This is... troublesome.

recipes.label: Terror Becomes Me
recipes.startdescription: When the lion roars, all other creatures lie low in fear, for they know the king of beasts has taken the field. And so I am a lion, and these souls my prey. [No Enemies will attack you or interfere with Objectives.]

recipes.label: Terror Becomes Me
recipes.startdescription: When the lion roars, all other creatures lie low in fear, for they know the king of beasts has taken the field. And so I am a lion, and these souls my prey. [No Enemies will attack you or interfere with Objectives.]

recipes.label: Terror Becomes Me
recipes.startdescription: When the lion roars, all other creatures lie low in fear, for they know the king of beasts has taken the field. And so I am a lion, and these souls my prey. [No Enemies will attack you or interfere with Objectives.]

recipes.label: The Index-Arcana Is Moving!
recipes.startdescription: The Index-Arcana's commando unit has crossed the line. They carry unfamiliar equipment, murmur ominous litanies, and move stealthily through the distorted light.

recipes.label: The Index-Arcana's Forces Are on the Move!
A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: One of our enemies seeks to strike at us -

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: This enemy unit moves in lockstep with its comrades -

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: This enemy unit moves in lockstep with its comrades -

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: This enemy unit moves in lockstep with its comrades -

recipes.label: A Hostile Offensive!
recipes.startdescription: One of our enemies seeks to strike at us -

recipes.label: Against the Légion du Seuil?
recipes.startdescription: We're all fighting over that star—which means the four forces are all hostile to one another. And this time, the Index-Arcana intends to tear apart the shadows from the ancient gate.

recipes.label: The Index-Arcana's Forces Did Not Prevail
recipes.startdescription: The Index-Arcana's ranks were dragged into the mist one by one, falling in rows before the dim gleam of bayonets and daggers. The Black Eagle's broken wings vanished into the depths of the fog, returning with their purpose unfulfilled.

recipes.label: The Index-Arcana's Forces Have Won!
recipes.startdescription: The phantoms of the moonlight were pinned to the mortal world by searing beams. The corpses of the legionaries piled into grotesque mounds. The Black Eagle's banner snaps in the wind over the land where those shadows have retreated.

recipes.label: Against the Légion du Seuil?

recipes.label: The Index-Arcana's Forces Have Won!

recipes.label: Against King Henry's Rifles?
recipes.startdescription: We're all fighting over that star—which means the four forces are all hostile to one another. And this time, the Index-Arcana has chosen to pour their heretical technology upon the New King's forces.

recipes.label: The Index-Arcana's Forces Did Not Prevail
recipes.startdescription: The New King's forces have shown astonishing resilience. The Index-Arcana's troops retreat in disarray, leaving behind a battlefield soaked in blood and mud.

recipes.label: The Index-Arcana's Forces Have Won!
recipes.startdescription: Gleaming boots sink into liquefied flesh. Pristine rifles dissolve into dust in the beams of light. The ranks of the Index-Arcana march indifferently over the still-smoking scorched earth.

recipes.label: Against King Henry's Rifles?
recipes.startdescription: We're all fighting over that star—which means the four forces are all hostile to one another. And this time, the Index-Arcana has chosen to pour their heretical technology upon the New King's forces.

recipes.label: A Commander Takes Action!
recipes.startdescription: “小卒，不要觊觎你不该染指之物。”

recipes.label: A Commander Takes Action!
recipes.startdescription: “小卒，不要觊觎你不该染指之物。”

recipes.label: Lethal Assault!
recipes.startdescription:
'The pain will pass quickly—I will teach you myself.'

[The Clockwork Lord is attempting to inflict physical harm on you and your allies. Place a card and meet one of his thresholds to successfully defend.]

recipes.label: Gears Engage
recipes.startdescription:
The clockwork continues to turn, though the body lies broken. Gears mesh, pistons thrust—precision-crafted artificial joints ignore the limits of mortal flesh. His eyes hold no pain, only cold, relentless calculation. The Clockwork Lord slowly retreats into shadow, as soldiers to either side advance to block my path.

[The Clockwork Lord can order other enemy forces to protect him. He cannot be attacked until these guardians are eliminated.]

recipes.label: Drawing Fire Upon Oneself
recipes.startdescription: 'Power must come from somewhere. Elevation always demands a price.' The Clockwork Lord's voice rasps like rusted gears grinding together. His cogs and components lie scattered across the ground, but his eyes remain fixed on me—fixed on the great work he could not complete, or perhaps on the void where that work should have been. 'I have paid. Have you?'

recipes.label: To Scatter Two Armies?
recipes.startdescription: I've broken one of the New King's sharpest swords, and even now his forces here are in disarray - but the contingent from the Légion du Seuil still has its commander. He'll have to die, too. Then the way to the star will be open.

recipes.label: To Scatter Two Armies?
recipes.startdescription: For all his fight and nerve, the Lieutenant-Ostiary is dead at last - but the King's Rifles are still making trouble on their commander's orders. He'll have to die, too. Then the way to the star will be open.

recipes.label: The Path to the Star Lies Open
recipes.startdescription: The forces of my adversaries scatter to the wind. Pockets of resistance remain, but without their commanders, they have ceased to be any true threat. Now, nothing stands between me and my heaven-sent prize.

recipes.label: To Scatter Three Armies?
recipes.startdescription: I have shattered two of my enemies. One last obstacle remains to be cleared before the path to the star will open.

recipes.label: To Scatter Three Armies?
recipes.startdescription: I've broken one of the New King's sharpest swords, and even now his forces here are in disarray - but the contingent from the Légion du Seuil still has its commander. He'll have to die, too. Then the way to the star will be open.

recipes.label: To Scatter Three Armies?
recipes.startdescription: For all his fight and nerve, the Lieutenant-Ostiary is dead at last - but the King's Rifles are still making trouble on their commander's orders. He'll have to die, too. Then the way to the star will be open.

recipes.label: To Scatter Three Armies?
recipes.startdescription: The Nazi war machine lies broken, but that is not enough—two obstacles still stand in my way—

recipes.label: The Path to the Star Lies Open
recipes.startdescription: The three armies that stood against me have scattered to the wind. Pockets of resistance remain, but without their commanders, they pose no true threat. Now, nothing stands between me and my heaven-sent prize.

recipes.label: Reposition
recipes.startdescription: The enemy forces are overwhelming. Soon, another unit is lost from our sight.

recipes.label: Stage an attack against an enemy?
recipes.startdescription:
This target is still protected.

[Until all Enemies possessing the Guarding: Jerome aspect are slain, you cannot attack Jerome Alexander.]

recipes.label: Stage an overwhelming attack using a violent strategy
recipes.startdescription: The convergence of opposed forces demands a resolution, and we are the stronger. Let's see them withstand this.

recipes.label: Stage an attack using a violent strategy
recipes.startdescription: Words end. Now is the time in which force will make its determinations.

recipes.label: Loose a petrifying roar
recipes.startdescription: I double over, every muscle in my body taut with rage. I cannot see anything but red. My lungs fill with air, but when I open my mouth, the sound that comes - the sound -
recipes.description: The ground cracks. Birds tumble dead from the sky. Trees twist and fall. The echo of my voice carries forth a challenge none will dare answer: face me, and die.

recipes.label: The Nazi war machine lies broken, but that is not enough—two obstacles still stand in my way—
recipes.startdescription: I double over, every muscle taut with rage. I see nothing but red. My lungs fill with air, but when I open my mouth, the sound that comes—the sound— [Using this skill in the Cradle of the Falling Star makes the user more vulnerable to enemy attacks.]
recipes.description: The ground cracks. Birds tumble dead from the sky. Trees twist and fall. The echo of my voice carries forth a challenge none will dare answer: face me, and die.

recipes.label: The Nazi war machine lies broken, but that is not enough—two obstacles still stand in my way—
recipes.startdescription: I double over, every muscle taut with rage. I see nothing but red. My lungs fill with air, but when I open my mouth, the sound that comes—the sound— [Using this skill in the Cradle of the Falling Star makes the user more vulnerable to enemy attacks.]
recipes.description: The ground cracks. Birds tumble dead from the sky. Trees twist and fall. The echo of my voice carries forth a challenge none will dare answer: face me, and die.

recipes.label: An Understanding in Blood
recipes.startdescription: Today I have defeated an enemy of inhuman quality - what some might call 'a monster.' The Lionsmith shapes monsters, and through battle, through the rigor of the field, I have learned a little of his craft.

recipes.label: Combatants, Assembling
recipes.startdescription: The countryside sprawls yawning before me. I have come according to the rules of the old sacrament, armed and armoured with nothing but my weapons and my skills. Here, I await the arrival of my opponent.
recipes.description: From the north, an approaching pair of silhouettes becomes visible in the distance. From the south, a lone figure marches steadily closer.

recipes.label: Combatants, Assembling
recipes.startdescription: The countryside sprawls yawning before me. I have come according to the rules of the old sacrament, armed and armoured with nothing but my weapons and my skills. Here, I await the arrival of my opponent.
recipes.description: From the north, an approaching pair of silhouettes becomes visible in the distance. From the south, a lone figure marches steadily closer.

recipes.label: Ally's Advice
recipes.startdescription: 'I must admit, I underestimated your assistance and resolve.' She glances at my adjutant, surprise in her eyes—but no fear. 'My own support, by comparison, seems so... unremarkable. But as His Highness's envoy, I must fulfill my duty.'
recipes.description: 'Keep your eyes clear and your focus sharp. Remember how the Lion-Smith once faced Antaeus. I'm not one for teaching, but... good luck.' With these words, she returns to her post.

recipes.label: A Defeat!
recipes.startdescription: @#foe.nightmare|The weapons of my spirit could not overcome this adversary. I am still mastered by my fears, and not the other way around.#|The offensive is foiled! The wounded make hasty retreat; the dead remain where they lie - the enemy put up a better defence than I had anticipated.@
